message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, even more so than that in the long run.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm not sure I can justify spending more than that for this product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price, but I'm confident this product offers you significant value beyond $8,000.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm really not comfortable going above $8,000. I'd like to make a serious offer, so I'll stick with my original counteroffer of $8,000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price.
